J = Jodhpur MS. No. 2244; C = Chennai GOML Ms. No. R 3239; Cpc = Ibid. post correctionem; M = Mysore ORI Ms. No. B 220. athavā dṛṣṭirdṛṣṭi netrayor dvayordvayo netrādhobhāgayornetrā 'dhobhāgayor akṣikūṭayos tad adhogallayo ūbhayorrūpayorrūpa uparipari sthirā kartavyā \normalpipe ekānte vijane dīpam āvarakeāvake saṃsthāpya ciraṃ gatvāvalokyastheyaṃ \normalpipe ghaṭīmātraṃghaṭīmātra vā ghaṭikārdhaṃ vā tato dīpam ācchādya bhūmau sarvatrāvalokane sarvaṃ śvetanīlapītayoṃtayomta sphuliṅgakaṇāṃ 'te maṇḍalākāriṇiś ceticeta jyotiścakrāṇi pañcaṣad vā dṛśyante \normalpipe tataś cāṃdhakārevāṃdhakāre dṛśyate \normalpipe dīptimatsarvaṃ svaśarīraṃ dṛśyate bhāsate sarvo 'pi sapradeśo dīptimān sphuṭo dṛśyate \normalpipe ekadārḍye jyotirmayacakrāṃte parameśvarasya tejomūrtir dṛśyate \normalpipe puṃsaḥ paramānandotpattir jāyate \normalpipe svadehavismṛtiś ca saṃbhavatisaṃbhavati | athavā svanetrayor vartmanīr dakṣahastamadhyamātarjanībhyām akṣikū dehavismṛtiś ca saṃbhavati | \normalpipe J = Jodhpur MS. No. 2244; C = Chennai GOML Ms. No. R 3239; Cpc = Ibid. post correctionem; M = Mysore ORI Ms. No. B 220. athavā svanetrayor vartamanīrvartmanā dakṣahastamadhyamātarjanībhyām akṣikuṭayorākṣikoṭayorakṣikūṭakūṭayorakṣikūtvā adhaḥ kṛtvāom. akṣivartmanīakṣivanmanī dṛḍhaṃ cālanī ye ghaṭikārdhaṃ vā ghaṭīmātraṃ tata evaṃ kṛte sādhyakasyāgre suśvītajyotiḥ prākāśaḥ prāgprāgvad bhavatīti \normalpipe PT= Prāṇatoṣiṇī quotes Yogavarodaya with reference yogasvarodaye. YK= Yogakarṇikā quotes Yogavarodaya with reference yogasvarodaye. antarlakṣaṃ śṛṇu subhruśukra°digvidigādivarjitam | bāhyabhyantara ākāśaṃ vādhāmantraṃ paraṃ mataṃom. ||calajjāgratsuṣupteṣu bhojaneṣu ca sarvadā | sarvāvasthāsu deveśi cittaṃ śūnye niyojayet ||karttā kārayitā śūnyaṃśunyaḥmūrtimān śūnya īśvaraḥ | harṣaśokaghaṭastho ’yaṃ janmamṛtyū labhet svayam ||ghaṭasthāṃghaṭasthā cintayencintyayor mūrttimitaśmūrtir hata°cintāsvarūpadhṛk | viṣayaṃ viṣavad dṛṣṭvāduṣṭaṃ tyaktvā jñātvā tu mārutam ||saṃjñāśūnyamanā bhūtvā puṇyapāpair na lipyate | bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ khaṃom. yadyad hihi antarlakṣam iti smṛtam ||etad dhyānāt sadā kiñcid duḥkhaṃ na syāc chivo bhavet | śūnyan tu saccidānandaṃ niḥśabdaṃ brahmaśabditam | saśabdaṃ jñeyam ākāśamākāśaiti bhedadvayan tv iha ||
